dublin_core.dcvalue: Integrated scalable, sustainable and readily-deployed applications with interoperable workflows within and across 5 functional health areas
Tim Wood, Director of Innovations in mHealth, Grameen Foundation | Email: twood@grameenfoundation.org
Over 20 countries including Afghanistan, Ethiopia, Ghana, India, Tanzania and Zambia
Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, Johnson & Johnson, Government of Norway, USAID

Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Financial transactions and incentives, Human resource management, Monitoring and evaluation, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider work planning and scheduling, Provider training and education, Registries and vital events tracking, Sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Supply chain management, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and reproductive health, Tuberculosis, Violence, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
